title: Knowing Is Not Enough
description: Alex Nichols thought being in a relationship was enough to make her happy. She was wrong. Never through Jake's actions or words did Alex ever feel he loved her. Seven years of marriage and three betrayals later, Alex has had enough and permits herself to dream of a different life with someone else. However, before happily ever after can become reality she must first learn how to deconstruct the emotional walls that have protected her in the past.
author: Patricia/P Ann/A Chatman/Walker
